fields.description: Each week BLACKMONK gives you the chance to win great prizes, and it's quick and easy to enter. You'll need to come back weekly to register for the current weekly drawing. You'll also receive a weekly email with valuable information on local news, events, and exciting things to see and do in BLACKMONK!
fields.title: ENTER FOR A CHANCE TO WIN WITH BLACKMONK!

fields.description: In order to enter for a chance to win, please complete the form above and register with BLACKMONK account if you haven't already done so. Registration is free and takes few seconds. By participating in the BLACKMONK sweepstakes, you will receive one entry. If you are interested in receiving additional entries, you can earn MORE entries by sharing with BLACKMONK sweepstakes and contributing to the BLACKMONK website by performing the various tasks listed below. The more entries you earn, the greater is your chance of win! At the end of each week, we will randomly select a winner.
fields.title: How do I enter ?

fields.description: By becoming a member and registering for the current sweepstakes draw, you will receive one entry. You can earn up to 15 additional entries for a total of 16 entries per sweepstakes by sharing and contributing to the BLACKMONK website. Once a new sweepstakes is published, you will then be able to start over.
fields.title: How many entries can I earn per sweepstakes ?

fields.description: The answer is no. Entering our sweepstakes draw and winning is 100% FREE. You'll need to come back weekly to register for the current weekly drawing.
fields.title: Does entering and winning cost money ?

fields.description: All winners will be notified via email. You will need to reply to the email and confirm your address. Once you have verified your address, your prize will be mailed to you. In some circumstances, we may require that you pick-up your prize.
fields.title: If I win a prize, how will I be notified and how can I claim my prize?

fields.title: How can I earn more entries?
